Logistics Overview: Preparing for Tomorrow
   
 

  Principles of Logistics

The principles of logistics should be used to guide the logistician’s actions at all times. The principles of logistics are overriding guidelines that any logistician can apply to any task. The most important thing to remember is that you use what you have to use to make yourself a better logistician. Never lose sight of the customer. You and your organization exist to support the customer. Use the logistics principles to make yourself and your organization better and smarter “customer servers.”


   
  For more depth on the Principles of Logistics, view the Joint Pub 4-0, and AFDD 4-0.
